languages.text: {n}Хладные торговцы сохраняют спокойствие. Вряд ли это первая угроза, которую они слышат в своей непростой жизни.{/n}
{n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хладные торговцы сохраняют спокойствие. Вряд ли это первая угроза, которую они слышат в своей непростой жизни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

{n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些冷市商人依然保持着冷静的态度，这些顽固的罪犯已经不是第一次被人威胁了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些冷市商人依然保持着冷静的态度，这些顽固的罪犯已经不是第一次被人威胁了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちは冷静さを保っている。この経験豊富な犯罪者たちが脅迫を受けたのは、今回が初めてではないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コールド・トレーダーたちは冷静さを保っている。この経験豊富な犯罪者たちが脅迫を受けたのは、今回が初めてではないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos mantienen la compostura. No es la primera vez que alguien amenaza a estos experimentados criminales, ni mucho menos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Comerciantes Fríos mantienen la compostura. No es la primera vez que alguien amenaza a estos experimentados criminales, ni mucho menos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée restent impassibles. Ces criminels endurcis ont l'habitude d'être la cible de menaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les marchands dans l'assemblée restent impassibles. Ces criminels endurcis ont l'habitude d'être la cible de menaces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kalthändler zeigen demonstrative Gelassenheit. Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass diese gewieften Kriminellen bedroht werden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Cold Traders maintain their cool composure. This is hardly the first time these hardened criminals have been threatened.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kalthändler zeigen demonstrative Gelassenheit. Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass diese gewieften Kriminellen bedroht werden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soğuk Tacirler, serinkanlı duruşlarını koruyor. Bu deneyimli suçluların ilk kez tehdit edilmediği belli.{/n}
